title: lost my main account
body: :((((((( somehow i lost my main account.  It just won't let me sign in.  I know I have the right password. Of course riot has been of no help also. So here i am, starting over.

replies.body: You might be connected to the wrong region on the patcher.  Make sure you're set to NA!  If you still have issues, check out the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide for some recovery instructions.  I hope that helps!
